hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: StartingStep
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The flow will start from the specified step

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: RunningMode
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The flow will start in the specified mode

secureScript.script: String major_min=BUILD_VERSION.substring(0,BUILD_VERSION.indexOf(".",3)) return "<input name=\"value\" value=\"${major_min}\" class=\"setting-input\" type=\"text\">"

secureFallbackScript.script: String major_min=BUILD_VERSION.substring(0,BUILD_VERSION.indexOf(".",3)) return "<input name=\"value\" value=\"${major_min}\" class=\"setting-input\" type=\"text\">"

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: emailGroups
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
This value is supplied by builds initiated through RTC.
Groups receipts are loaded from \\isr1appcc02\SCM\OMD\Jenkins_Build_conf_files\Email_Groups.txt

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: LOG_VERBOSITY
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: MSBuild verbosity to run the build with

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: ReplaceSnaps
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description:
Replace snapshots/baselines with same build number if exists.
Since RTC is not supporing baseline replce/delete, old snapshots and baselines will be renamed.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: TestsArray
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description:
What tests needs to run and in which confgurations?
Test details are shared in arrays, seperated by comma. Test arrays are seperated by semicomma and can be entered in diffrent lines

Input Syntax:
[
[SuiteName,SuitePath,ToolType,ATEControllerMachineLabel,SimulatorEngineMachineLabel,BaseImagePath,BaseImageName,ATEScriptsPath];
[SuiteName,SuitePath,ToolType,ATEControllerMachineLabel,SimulatorEngineMachineLabel,BaseImagePath,BaseImageName,ATEScriptsPath]
]

Details:
SuiteName:File name of the test suite (excluding suffix)
SuitePath:suite file location
ToolType: As TL/A700/A600
ATEControllerMachineLabel:Jenkins label name for ATE controllers machines to let the mechanism select one
SimulatorEngineMachineLabel: Jenkins label name for simulator machines to let the mechanism select one
BaseImagePath:Template image file location
BaseImageName:Acronis template image to recover simulator machine from prior installation
ATEScriptsPath:ATE execution scripts folder


Example:
[
[AROL_Autorun_ATE_Suite,X:\ATE\TestCases\SQC\MBS\AROL,A700,SCM-ATE-01,SimulatorEngine,D:\BaseImage,17.02.00.30500_TL_ATE_Image,\\isr1vmappcm01\Automated_Testing\17.0x_ATE];
[AROL_Autorun_ATE_Suite,X:\ATE\TestCases\SQC\MBS\AROL,A600,SCM-ATE-01,SimulatorEngine,D:\BaseImage,17.02.00.30500_TL_ATE_Image,\\isr1vmappcm01\Automated_Testing\17.0x_ATE];
[AROL_Autorun_ATE_Suite,X:\ATE\TestCases\SQC\MBS\AROL,TL,SCM-ATE-01,SimulatorEngine,D:\BaseImage,17.02.00.30500_TL_ATE_Image,\\isr1vmappcm01\Automated_Testing\17.0x_ATE]
]
